meshConfig.additionalTypeDefs:
type CategoriesResponse {
  categories: JSON
  total_count: Int
  message: String
  status: String
}
type EnrichedProduct {
  sku: String!
  name: String
  price: Float
  qty: Float
  categories: [ProductCategory]
  images: [ProductImage]
  media_gallery_entries: [MediaGalleryEntry]
  inventory: ProductInventory
}
type EnrichedProductsResponse {
  products: [EnrichedProduct]
  total_count: Int
  message: String
  status: String
  performance: ProductsPerformance
}
type InventoryResponse {
  inventory: JSON
  total_count: Int
  message: String
  status: String
}
type MediaGalleryEntry {
  file: String
  url: String
  position: Int
  types: [String]
}
type ProductCategory {
  id: String!
  name: String!
}
type ProductImage {
  filename: String
  url: String
  position: Int
  roles: [String]
}
type ProductInventory {
  qty: Float
  is_in_stock: Boolean
}
type ProductsPerformance {
  processedProducts: Int
  apiCalls: Int
  method: String
  executionTime: Float
  totalTime: String
  productFetch: String
  dataExtraction: String
  parallelFetch: String
  dataEnrichment: String
  productsApiCalls: Int
  categoriesApiCalls: Int
  inventoryApiCalls: Int
  totalApiCalls: Int
  uniqueCategories: Int
  productCount: Int
  skuCount: Int
  clientCalls: Int
  dataSourcesUnified: Int
  queryConsolidation: String
  cacheHitRate: Int
  categoriesCached: Int
  categoriesFetched: Int
  operationComplexity: String
  dataFreshness: String
  clientComplexity: String
  apiOrchestration: String
  parallelization: String
  meshOptimizations: [String]
}
type ProductsDebug {
  resolverCalled: Boolean
  hasContext: Boolean
  hasHeaders: Boolean
  oauthConsumerKey: String
  adminUsername: String
  timestamp: String
  productsCount: Int
  categoriesCount: Int
  inventoryCount: Int
  hasOAuthCredentials: Boolean
  hasAdminCredentials: Boolean
  errorType: String
  errorMessage: String
}
type ProductsResponse {
  products: [EnrichedProduct]
  total_count: Int
  message: String
  status: String
  performance: ProductsPerformance
  debug: ProductsDebug
}
extend type Query {
  mesh_products_enriched(pageSize: Int, maxPages: Int): ProductsResponse
}
